description: This Dart source file defines a VehiclesProvider class used for managing the state of vehicle data within a Flutter application. It utilizes ChangeNotifier for state updates and interacts with a data source to perform CRUD operations as well as filtering and searching vehicles.

classes.name: VehiclesProvider
classes.description: A state management provider utilizing ChangeNotifier to handle vehicle data, including loading, searching, filtering, and CRUD operations.

methods.name: loadVehicles
methods.description: Fetches all vehicles from the data source and updates the internal list, applying current filters.

methods.name: searchVehicles
methods.description: Sets the search query and filters vehicles based on name, type, or license plate.

methods.name: filterVehicles
methods.description: Filters vehicles based on their status (e.g., 'Active', 'Inactive', or 'All').

methods.name: _applyFilters
methods.description: Internal method that filters the vehicle list according to current search query and status filter.

methods.name: addVehicle
methods.description: Adds a new vehicle to the data source and refreshes the vehicle list.

methods.name: updateVehicle
methods.description: Updates an existing vehicle in the data source and refreshes the vehicle list.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Deletes a vehicle from the data source by ID and refreshes the vehicle list.
